summary: The 2024 NFL draft, held in Detroit, broke records with over 775,000 attendees. Six quarterbacks were picked in the first round, tying a record from 1983. This was also the first time since 1970 that no quarterbacks were chosen in the second to fourth rounds. Seven wide receivers were selected in the first round, matching the record from 2004. Additionally, a record 23 offensive players were picked in the first round, with 14 chosen consecutively to start the draft.
title: 2024 NFL draft
